list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Add theming support to Navigation component
Implemented the `useTheme` hook from `next-themes` to dynamically adjust the SVG fill color based on the current theme. This change ensures consistency in appearance between light and dark themes and improves user experience. Updated IntelliJ IDEA workspace configuration to reflect the theming changes in Navigation.tsx.

task.summary: Default task

Remove unnecessary IntelliJ IDEA configuration files
Deleted several IntelliJ IDEA project configuration files that are not needed for this project. This will help reduce clutter and avoid potential merge conflicts related to IDE-specific settings.

Add IntelliJ IDEA project configuration files
Introduced several .idea XML files for project-specific settings, code styles, and inspection profiles. Updated README to reflect the correct repository name and deployment link.

Update deployment URLs and improve IntelliJ config
Changed deployment URL from vercel.app to nicholasadamou.com in getBaseUrl.ts and layout.tsx. Enhanced IntelliJ IDEA project configuration by adding selective auto-reload and updated various XML settings. Standardized references in project and blog content for consistency.

Add RSS feed generation and update dependencies
Introduced `generate-rss.js` to automatically generate an RSS feed for blog posts. Integrated `rss` and `gray-matter` packages to handle RSS feed and markdown parsing, respectively. Updated layout to include a link to the RSS feed and modified the build script to run the RSS generation.

Remove unused assets and redundant files
Deleted unnecessary files including font, RSS generator, middleware, newsletter signup, ConvertKit API routes, and tag component. Updated project page layout and configuration. Added robots.txt and sitemap.xml for SEO.

Remove unused assets and redundant files
Deleted unnecessary files including font, RSS generator, middleware, newsletter signup, ConvertKit API routes, and tag component. Updated project page layout and configuration. Added robots.txt and sitemap.xml for improved SEO.

Add reading statistics to project and blog pages
Included reading statistics directly onto the project and blog pages for better visibility. Also corrected JSX formatting and ensured consistent spacing in the code.

Add reading statistics to project and blog pages
Included reading statistics directly on the project and blog pages for better visibility. Corrected JSX formatting and ensured consistent spacing in the code. Updated the workspace configuration to reflect these changes.

Format JSX, update content, and adjust workspace config
This commit improves readability and consistency by formatting JSX and updating content in the `Home` component. Additionally, it adjusts the workspace configuration to ensure changes are accurately reflected. These enhancements contribute to cleaner code and better developer experience.

Improve error handling and add logging
Enhanced `incrementViews` and `getViewsCount` functions with try-catch blocks for better error handling. Added console logs for easier debugging and system monitoring. Updated `.idea/workspace.xml` to reflect new changes and improve code readability and configuration tracking.

Add popover click handlers for improved UX
Implemented useEffect to handle clicks outside the popover to close it. Added link click handlers to ensure the popover closes when internal links are clicked. This ensures a more seamless user experience when navigating the menu.

Create ListSection component and organize data structure
Added a new `ListSection` component to streamline list rendering. Moved `ConnectLinks` and `Resumes` to the `app/about/data` directory and created a new file for `Portfolio`. Updated `about/page.tsx` to utilize the new `ListSection` component, enhancing code modularity and maintainability.

Fix blog_views increment logic and clean up workspace config
Corrected the SQL query for incrementing blog views by using `EXCLUDED.count`. Additionally, cleaned up the workspace.xml file by updating task summaries and removing redundant entries. This improves both the database operation and the project configuration management.

Refactor project and blog pages, update date formatting.
Reorganized markup for better readability and structure on project and blog pages. Enhanced blog date formatting by introducing short and long date utility functions. Updated references and fixed workspace.xml comments for clarity and improved task management.

Refactor project and blog pages, update date formatting.
Reorganized markup for better readability and structure on project and blog pages. Enhanced blog date formatting by introducing short and long date utility functions. Updated references and fixed workspace.xml comments for clarity and improved task management.

Update blog description and tweak workspace configuration
Enhanced the text in the blog description to provide more detailed and engaging content on programming, productivity, and other topics. Also adjusted the IntelliJ workspace configuration to reflect recent changes, including task management updates.

Update responsive text and layout, add environment checks
Enhanced responsiveness of text and layout across project and blog pages by adjusting font sizes and container dimensions. Removed unused environment variables in .env.example and added checks for POSTGRE_URL in database actions and queries to prevent errors. Updated IntelliJ IDEA workspace configuration to reflect recent changes.

Fix POSTGRE_URL typo in database functions
Corrected the environment variable from POSTGRE_URL to POSTGRES_URL in both incrementViews and getViewsCount functions. Updated the IntelliJ IDEA workspace configuration to reflect recent changes and ensure checks for environment variables are accurate.

Add theming support to Navigation component
Implemented the `useTheme` hook from `next-themes` to dynamically adjust the SVG fill color based on the current theme. This change ensures consistency in appearance between light and dark themes and improves user experience. Updated IntelliJ IDEA workspace configuration to reflect the theming changes in Navigation.tsx.
